channel.title: New(bie)
channel.description:
hi all, im new to this site/ world of undergrounds rs2 ;D i like your site.. its clear where to go, and what to find where :P for noob like me. i play runescape for 2 years now, and untill a few days ago, always played it honest, without cheat, macro or w/e it is ;) anyway, i think its enough.. im a lvl 91er and most money i ever had was 7 mill.. that pethathic for some1 who plays it 2 years. so i decided to help my character to get something higher, richer, and more respected by others. ive been looking on your page a few times, but i must say, i dont get a shit about it.. all talking about SRL and SCAR programs. so.. hereby i would like some1 to explain to me abit, how to install such thing as a auto-w/e... any help how to start, and where to end is welcome :)
greetz Me
added: i love this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/function.mysql-connect

item.title: New(bie)
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

well.. maybe:

thx, but do i have to downlaod all 3 files on that site? :o

Yes. My suggestion to you is learn how to script in SCAR. The best scripts are (good) private scripts.

Read full topic

item.title: New(bie)
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

dark_child:

or open to windows/tabs and start one runescape in a unsigned applet and start the other tab/window in a signed applet(default) and login to the same world

that is really detectable…Id advise you not to do that.

Read full topic

item.title: New(bie)
item.dc:creator: @dark_child dark_child
item.description:
@dark_child wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:2, topic:49723”]Well heres some advice. If you care about your main, make a new character and auto on that. (Then drop trade your stuff or use 2 computers :P)[/quote]or open to windows/tabs and start one runescape in a unsigned applet and start the other tab/window in a signed applet(default) and login to the same world

Read full topic

item.title: New(bie)
item.dc:creator: @MybJames MybJames
item.description:
@MybJames wrote:

yes, starblasters script is excellent, it is well worth the 1million.

Anyway, you will have to download SCAR (which is the cheating program)

from then on, you have to find a script and copy and paste it (or download it) and put it into the SCAR interface.

Then select the runescape window and press play!

Read full topic

item.title: New(bie)
item.dc:creator: @well_maybe well.. maybe
item.description:
@well_maybe wrote:

thx for kind words lol, i think ill feel home here real quick ;D

[quote=“Rictoo, post:6, topic:49723”]Hmmm… were you sent here by “Lovemyregex”? (If you were, I’m him)

Well, welcome to the community! Hope you enjoy it here :D[/quote]

i have not been send by lovemyregex lol, i will anyway
but can any1 explain a bits how to use a scar prog?
i might buy the 1 from starblaster, is that a good 1? like anti-ban stuff

Read full topic

item.title: New(bie)
item.dc:creator: @Gods_Fury Gods Fury
item.description:
@Gods_Fury wrote:

goatee:

Well heres some advice. If you care about your main, make a new character and auto on that. (Then drop trade your stuff or use 2 computers :P)

^^^^^
Just like he said,

Also,

i play for 1,5 years now and max amount of money i’ve had is 3,4 but my acc’s value is 20m+:)

Read full topic

item.title: New(bie)
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Welcome, I’m glad you chose to come over to the light side.

If you are going to auto on your main (which I don’t suggest) make sure you use SCAR and only very good scripts from great scripters. If the script is not good enough it will get you banned.

And I love the error page too, I stole it from another site about a year ago.

Read full topic
